00029   IntegratedHcalCalibrationProcessor aIntegratedHcalCalibrationProcessor;
00030 
00031   IntegratedHcalCalibrationProcessor::IntegratedHcalCalibrationProcessor() : 
00032     IntegratedHcalProcessor("IntegratedHcalCalibrationProcessor")
00033   {  
00034     _description = "Integrated data base based calibration for CALICE Hcal";
00035   
00036     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName", 
00037                                "Name of the input collection",
00038                                _inputColName, 
00039                                std::string("CaliceHitsLevel1"));
00040                             
00041     registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollectionName", 
00042                                "Name of the output collection",
00043                                _outputColName, 
00044                                std::string("CaliceHitsLevel2"));
00045 
00046     registerProcessorParameter("PedestalSubtraction", 
00047                                "apply (1) or ignore (0) the pedestal subtraction",
00048                                _pedestalSubtraction, 
00049                                (int) 1);                
00050    
00051     registerProcessorParameter("ZeroSuppression", 
00052                                "apply (1) or ignore (0) mip threshold cut",
00053                                _zeroSuppression, 
00054                                (int) 1);
00055 
00056     registerProcessorParameter("SignificanceCut", 
00057                                "Defines how significant the deviation of a hit "
00058                                "from the pedestal has to be to survive. Always applied.",
00059                                _significanceCut, 
00060                                (float) 3.0);
00061 
00062     registerProcessorParameter("SkipPedestals", 
00063                                "Skip all events which have been used for "
00064                                "pedestal calculations in the following "
00065                                "processors",
00066                                _skipPedestals, 
00067                                (int) 0);                
00068              
00069     registerProcessorParameter("minPedNumber", "Minimum number of pedestal "
00070                                "before the pedestal value is considered "
00071                                "valid and pedestal substraction is applied",
00072                                _minPedNumber, 
00073                                (int) 250);
00074 
00075     registerProcessorParameter("MipCut", "Minimal energy deposition in "
00076                                "units of MIP to keep hit, applied only if ZeroSuppression==1.",
00077                                _mipCut, 
00078                                (float) 0.5);            
00079 
00080     registerProcessorParameter("SaturationCorrection", "Toggle application of "
00081                                "saturation correction",
00082                                _doSaturationCorrection,
00083                                true);
00084              
00085   }
00086     
00087 
00088   void IntegratedHcalCalibrationProcessor::init(){
00089 
00090     //  initialize inherited IntegratedHcalProcessor
00091     IntegratedHcalProcessor::init();
00092 
00093     //  reset private containers for pedestal
00094     if ( _pedestalSubtraction == 1 ) {
00095       for ( unsigned short mod=0; mod<HCAL_N_MOD+1; mod++ ){
00096         for ( unsigned short cell=0; cell<HCAL_N_CELL; cell++ ){
00097           _pedSum[mod][cell] = 0;
00098           _pedSumSquare[mod][cell] = 0;
00099           _pedNum[mod][cell] = 0;
00100           _ped[mod][cell] = 0;
00101           _pedWidth[mod][cell] = 0;
00102         }
00103       }
00104       _pedCounter = 0;
00105     }
00106 
00107     //  reset private counters
00108     _hitCounter = 0;
00109     _eventCounter = 0;
00110     _saturationCounter = 0; 
00111   }
00112 
00113 
00114   void IntegratedHcalCalibrationProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent *evt) {
00115 
00116     lcio::LCCollection* inVector = NULL;
00117     try {
00118 
00119       // input collection is ADC per cell
00120       inVector = evt->getCollection(_inputColName);
00121     
00122     } // end of try to read input collection
00123     catch ( DataNotAvailableException &e ) {
00124 
00125       streamlog_out( ERROR0 ) << "IntegratedHcalCalibrationProcessor::processEvent(): " 
00126                               << "missing collection " << _inputColName
00127                               << std::endl;
00128       return;
00129 
00130     }   
00131 
00132     //    create output collection and set appropriate falgs
00133     lcio::LCCollectionVec* _outputCol = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::RAWCALORIMETERHIT );
00134     if ( !_outputCol ) { 
00135       throw runtime_error( "IntegratedHcalCalibrationProcessor::processEvent(): "
00136                            "couldn't create new collection" );
00137     }
00138     lcio::LCFlagImpl hitFlag( _outputCol->getFlag() );
00139     hitFlag.setBit( LCIO::RCHBIT_TIME );
00140     hitFlag.setBit( LCIO::CHBIT_ID1 );
00141     _outputCol->setFlag( hitFlag.getFlag() );
00142   
00143 
00144     //   save average calo temp as collection parameter
00145     float avgTemp = _tempProvider->getAvgTemp();
00146     _outputCol->parameters().setValue( "avgTemp", avgTemp );
00147   
00148     //   save average module temp as collection parameters
00149     vector< float > avgModTemp;
00150     vector< int > modNum;
00151     for( unsigned i=1; i<HCAL_N_MOD; i++ ) {
00152       try {
00153         float modTemp = _tempProvider->getAvgModuleTemp( i );
00154         avgModTemp.push_back( modTemp );
00155         modNum.push_back( i );
00156       } catch ( std::out_of_range &e ) {
00157         //  we don't know how many modules are present
00158         //  we loop over the maximum of 1...38
00159         //  and do nothing if module does not exist
00160       }
00161     }
00162     _outputCol->parameters().setValues( "avgModTemp_value", avgModTemp );
00163     _outputCol->parameters().setValues( "avgModTemp_moduleNumber", modNum );
00164 
00165 
00166     //  check whether the event is a pedestal event
00167     const TriggerBits trigBits( evt->getParameters().getIntVal( PAR_TRIGGER_EVENT ) );
00168     if ( trigBits.isPurePedestalTrigger() && ( _pedestalSubtraction == 1 ) ) {
00169 
00170       streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "collecting pedestals" << std::endl;
00171 
00172       //  loop over all pedestal amplitudes
00173       for ( unsigned i=0; 
00174             i < static_cast< unsigned >( inVector->getNumberOfElements() ); 
00175             i++ ){
00176 
00177         RawCalorimeterHit* aRawCalorimeterHit = 
00178           dynamic_cast< RawCalorimeterHit* >( inVector->getElementAt( i ) );
00179 
00180         if ( !aRawCalorimeterHit ) {
00181           streamlog_out( ERROR0 ) << "ERROR - Collection " << _inputColName 
00182                                   << " doesn't contain RawCalorimeterHits/"
00183                                   << "FastCaliceHits -- will have to stop" 
00184                                   << std::endl;
00185           return;
00186         }
00187   
00188         //  create FastCaliceHit from input, extract information, delete again
00189         FastCaliceHit* hit = new FastCaliceHit( aRawCalorimeterHit );
00190         const unsigned short module = hit->getModule();
00191         const unsigned short cell = hit->getChip()*18 + hit->getChannel();
00192         float ampl = hit->getEnergyValue();
00193         delete hit;
00194 
00195         if ((module > HCAL_N_MOD+1) || (cell > HCAL_N_CELL)) {
00196           streamlog_out( ERROR0 ) << "invalid cell:" << *hit << std::endl;
00197           continue;
00198         }
00199         streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "  pedestal hit: " << *hit << std::endl;
00200 
00201         //  store the sum / sum2 / N of all pedestal events
00202         _pedSum[module][cell] += ampl;
00203         _pedSumSquare[module][cell] += pow(ampl,2);
00204         _pedNum[module][cell]++;
00205 
00206         //  the pedestal is the average of all pedestal "hits"
00207         _ped[module][cell] = _pedSum[module][cell]/_pedNum[module][cell];
00208         //  the pedestal width is the RMS
00209         _pedWidth[module][cell] = 
00210           sqrt( _pedSumSquare[module][cell] / _pedNum[module][cell] -
00211                 pow( _pedSum[module][cell] / _pedNum[module][cell], 2 ) );
00212         //  the pedestal error is RMS/sqrt(N)
00213         _pedError[module][cell] = 
00214           _pedNum[module][cell]>0 
00215           ? _pedWidth[module][cell]/sqrt(_pedNum[module][cell]) 
00216           : 0;
00217       }
00218       _pedCounter++;
00219       if ( _skipPedestals != 0 ) { 
00220         throw marlin::SkipEventException( &aIntegratedHcalCalibrationProcessor );
00221       }
00222     }
00223 
00224 
00225     // start of calibration if all constrains are true
00226     if ( ( _pedCounter >= _minPedNumber ) || ( _pedestalSubtraction == 0 ) ) {
00227       _eventCounter++;
00228 
00229       // loop over all hits
00230       for ( unsigned i = 0; 
00231             i < static_cast<unsigned>( inVector->getNumberOfElements() ); 
00232             i++) 
00233         {
00234           
00235           RawCalorimeterHit* aRawCalorimeterHit = 
00236             dynamic_cast< RawCalorimeterHit* >( inVector->getElementAt( i ) );
00237           
00238           if ( !aRawCalorimeterHit ) {
00239             
00240             std::stringstream message;
00241             message << "Collection " << _inputColName 
00242                     << " doesn't contain RawCalorimeterHits/FastCaliceHits" 
00243                     << std::endl;
00244             
00245             throw runtime_error(message.str());
00246           }
00247           FastCaliceHit* hit = new FastCaliceHit( aRawCalorimeterHit );
00248           
00249           // get the amplitude (in ADC) and further hit properties
00250           float ampl = hit->getEnergyValue();
00251           float amplErr = hit->getEnergyError();
00252           int cellID = hit->getCellID();
00253           const int time = hit->getTimeStamp();
00254 
00255           const unsigned short module = hit->getModule();
00256           const unsigned short chip = hit->getChip();
00257           const unsigned short channel = hit->getChannel();
00258           const unsigned short cell = chip*18 + channel;
00259 
00260           delete hit;
00261           
00262           streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "start calibrating hit: " << *hit << std::endl;
00263           
00264           if ((module > HCAL_N_MOD+1) || (cell > HCAL_N_CELL)) {
00265             streamlog_out( ERROR0 ) << "  STOP - invalid cell at mod/chip/chan "
00266                                     << module << "/" << chip << "/" << channel 
00267                                     << std::endl;
00268             continue;
00269           }
00270 
00271           //  count hits close or at the ADC limit (ADC has sign bit + 15 data bits)
00272           if ( ampl > 30000 ) {
00273             _saturationCounter++;
00274             _saturations[module]++;
00275           }
00276           
00277           // do (optional) pedestal subtraction
00278           if ( _pedestalSubtraction == 1 ) {
00279             
00280             streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "  subtracting pedestal: " << _ped[module][cell]
00281                                   << std::endl;
00282             
00283             // subtract the pedestal from the amplitude and add errors in quadrature
00284             ampl -= _ped[module][cell];
00285             amplErr = std::sqrt( pow( amplErr, 2 ) +
00286                                  pow( _pedError[module][cell], 2 ) );
00287 
00288             streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "     pedestal subtracted amplitude: " << ampl 
00289                                     << std::endl;
00290             
00291           }
00292           
00293           //  apply significance cut
00294           if ( ampl < _significanceCut * _pedWidth[module][cell] ) {
00295             
00296             streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "  STOP - not significant: " << ampl 
00297                                     << " in mod/chip/chan " 
00298                                     << module << "/" << chip << "/" << channel 
00299                                     << "  with cut " << _significanceCut 
00300                                     << "  ped-width " << _pedWidth[module][cell] 
00301                                     << std::endl;
00302             continue; 
00303           }
00304 
00305 
00306           //  get the mip calibration and convert to MIP
00307           float mip  = getMip( cellID );
00308           streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "  getting MIP constant: " << mip << std::endl;
00309 
00310           //  convert ADC -> MIP or stop if no suitable MIP coefficient available
00311           if ( mip > 0 )
00312             ampl /= mip;
00313           else {
00314             streamlog_out( ERROR0 ) << "  ERROR - ignoring cell with negative/"
00315                                     << "zero MIP coefficient at mod/chip/chan " 
00316                                     << module << "/" << chip << "/" << channel
00317                                     << std::endl;
00318             continue;
00319           }
00320           streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "  amplitude in MIP: " << ampl << std::endl;
00321 
00322           if ( _zeroSuppression &&  ampl < _mipCut ) {
00323             streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "  STOP - below threshold of: " << _mipCut 
00324                                     << std::endl;
00325             continue;
00326           }
00327 
00328           //  we have a hit, so count it
00329           _hitCounter++;
00330 
00331 
00332           //  apply (optional) saturation correction ...
00333           if( _doSaturationCorrection == true ) {
00334             streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "  correcting saturation" << std::endl;
00335 
00336             //  get the rest of the calibrations
00337             float gain = getGain( cellID );
00338             float ic   = getIC( cellID );
00339             float lightyield = mip/gain*ic;
00340             streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "     Gain constant: " << gain
00341                                     << " IC constant: " << ic
00342                                     << " lightyield: " << lightyield
00343                                     << std::endl;
00344             if ( lightyield <= 0 ) {
00345               streamlog_out( ERROR0 ) << "  ERROR - ignoring cell with negative/"
00346                                       << "zero lightyield at mod/chip/chan " 
00347                                       << module << "/" << chip << "/" << channel
00348                                       << std::endl;
00349               continue;
00350             }
00351 
00352             //  1. convert MIP -> pixel
00353             ampl = ampl * lightyield;
00354             streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "    amplitude [pix]: " << ampl;
00355 
00356             //  2. correct amplitude
00357             ampl = getCorrectedAmplitude(cellID, ampl);
00358             streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "  corrected [pix]: " << ampl;
00359 
00360             //  3. convert pixel -> MIP
00361             ampl = ampl / lightyield;
00362             streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << "  corrected [MIP]: " << ampl 
00363                                     << std::endl;
00364 
00365             //  TODO: correct calculation of amplitude error
00366             amplErr = 0;
00367           }
00368 
00369           streamlog_out( DEBUG0 ) << " DONE - calibrated amplitude: " << ampl 
00370                                   << std::endl;
00371 
00372 
00373           // create the new output hit
00374           FastCaliceHit* newHit = new FastCaliceHit( cellID,
00375                                                      ampl, 
00376                                                      amplErr, 
00377                                                      time );
00378           if ( !newHit ) { 
00379             throw runtime_error("Couldn't create new hit."); 
00380           }
00381 
00382           // add the new hit to the output collection
00383           _outputCol->addElement( newHit );
00384           
00385           // for the temperature correction statistics 
00386           fillTempCountMaps( cellID ); 
00387           
00388         }    // end of loop over input hits
00389 
00390       // add the output collection to the event
00391       evt->addCollection( _outputCol, _outputColName );
00392     }
00393   
00394   }
00395 
00396 
00397   void IntegratedHcalCalibrationProcessor::end () {
00398 
00399     printTempCountMaps(std::cout);
00400 
00401     std::cout << "---  " << name () << " Report :" << std::endl;
00402     std::cout << "  processed " << _eventCounter << " events" << std::endl;
00403 
00404     std::cout << "  processed " << _hitCounter << " hits ("
00405               << std::fixed << std::setprecision (1) 
00406               << (float) _hitCounter / (float) _eventCounter 
00407               << " per event)" 
00408               << std::resetiosflags (std::ios::fixed) << std::setprecision (6) 
00409               << std::endl;
00410 
00411     std::cout << "  found " << _invalidMIPCounter 
00412               << " hits with invalid MIP calibration (" 
00413               << std::fixed << std::setprecision (1) 
00414               << (float) _invalidMIPCounter / (float) _hitCounter *100 << "%, " 
00415               << std::fixed << std::setprecision (1) 
00416               << (float) _invalidMIPCounter / (float) _eventCounter 
00417               << " per event) " 
00418               << std::resetiosflags (std::ios::fixed) 
00419               << std::setprecision (6) << std::endl;
00420 
00421     std::cout << std::fixed << std::setprecision (1) << "   per module: ";
00422 
00423     for (std::map < unsigned, unsigned >::const_iterator it =
00424            _invalidMIPCalibrations.begin (); 
00425          it != _invalidMIPCalibrations.end ();
00426          it++) {
00427 
00428       std::cout << it->first << "/" 
00429                 << (float) it->second / (float) _eventCounter 
00430                 << "  ";
00431     }
00432 
00433     std::cout << std::resetiosflags (std::ios::fixed) 
00434               << std::setprecision (6) 
00435               << std::endl;
00436 
00437     std::cout << "  found " 
00438               << _invalidSaturationCorrectionCounter 
00439               << " hits with invalid saturation correction (" 
00440               << std::fixed << std::setprecision (1) 
00441               << (float) _invalidSaturationCorrectionCounter /
00442       (float) _hitCounter *100 << "%, " 
00443               << std::fixed << std::setprecision (1) 
00444               << (float) _invalidSaturationCorrectionCounter /
00445       (float) _eventCounter 
00446               << " per event) " 
00447               << std::resetiosflags (std::ios::fixed) 
00448               << std::setprecision (6) << std::endl;
00449 
00450     std::cout << std::fixed << std::setprecision (1) << "   per module: ";
00451 
00452     for (std::map < unsigned, unsigned >::const_iterator it =
00453            _invalidSaturationCorrections.begin ();
00454          it != _invalidSaturationCorrections.end (); 
00455          it++) {
00456       std::cout << it->first << "/" 
00457                 << (float) it->second /
00458         (float) _eventCounter 
00459                 << "  ";
00460     }
00461 
00462     std::cout << std::resetiosflags (std::ios::fixed) << std::setprecision (6) 
00463               << std::endl;
00464 
00465     std::cout << "  found " << _saturationCounter 
00466               << " saturated hits (" 
00467               << std::fixed << std::setprecision (1) 
00468               << (float) _saturationCounter /
00469       (float) _hitCounter *100 << "%, " 
00470               << std::fixed << std::setprecision (1) 
00471               << (float) _saturationCounter /
00472       (float) _eventCounter << " per event) " 
00473               << std::resetiosflags (std::ios::fixed) 
00474               << std::setprecision (6) << std::endl;
00475 
00476     std::cout << std::fixed << std::setprecision (1) << "   per module: ";
00477 
00478     for (std::map < unsigned, unsigned >::const_iterator it =
00479            _saturations.begin (); 
00480          it != _saturations.end (); 
00481          it++) {
00482       std::cout << it->first << "/" 
00483                 << (float) it->second /
00484         (float) _eventCounter 
00485                 << "  ";
00486     }
00487 
00488     std::cout << std::resetiosflags (std::ios::fixed) << std::setprecision (6) 
00489               << std::endl;
00490 
00491   }
